Welcome to Sylas, the ultimate tool for students, professionals, and lifelong learners. Whether youâ€™re mastering a new language, preparing for exams, or enhancing professional skills, Sylas is designed to make your learning journey smoother and more efficient.

Spaced repetition?

Spaced repetition is based on the idea that we tend to remember information that we use frequently. Studies have shown that people forget information within just 24 hours of learning it. Basically, the best way to commit something to long-term memory is to review the material at regular intervals.

Build your library

Sylas keeps your cards organized locally and on the cloud

Click on button, fill in the fields, and Viola! Give your cards some tags and Sylas will keep them neat and organized.

Review your cards

Let Sylas figure out the optimal time to review your cards

Sylas schedules a review for your card just as your about to forget about it.

Calibrate the algorithm

Calibrate the algorithm by scoring your recall of the information.

Sylas will automatically fine-tune your review schedule based on your feedback.

More than 2 million students, professionals, and hobbyists use Sylas to learn a language, aid in their studies, remember dates and names, and much more.

Features

Here's what we have to offer.

Vast Library of Flashcards

Access thousands of pre-made flashcards or create your own. From languages to law, ourextensive range covers all your learning needs.

Progress Tracking

Visualize your learning journey with detailed stats and progress reports. Watch your knowledge grow and adjust your study habits with actionable insights.

Cross-Platform Accessibility

Study anytime, anywhere. Our platform syncs across all devices, so you can learn on the go with our mobile app or settle down for a session on your desktop.

AI-powered algorithm

Leverage AI to tailor your learning experience. Sylas adjusts based on your performance and preferences, ensuring you study the right material at the right time.

Customizable themes

Personalize the look and feel of the app with various themes and color schemes to suit your preferences.

Offline Access

Access and review your flashcards even without an internet connection. Study on the go without any interruptions.

Our pricing plans

We offer monthly and yearly billing options to suit your needs. Save more with annual subscriptions!

Perfect for beginners and casual users who are just starting out with spaced repetition and want to explore its benefits.
